KONTAKION.LANGUAGE:
<TEXT Value="Lenten Kontakion for Wednesday and Friday
Hasten to our aide, ere we be enslaved to the enemies that blaspheme Thee and threaten us, O Christ our God. By Thy Cross, destroy them that war against us. Let them learn the might of the Orthodox Faith; through the intercessions of the Theotokos, O only Lover of mankind."/>
